title: Creativity-Based Instructional Design Expert Competency Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Practical Experience, Competency in Digital Tool Utilization
context.additional_context: Project-based course conducted in a smartphone-based mobile environment. Focused on developing creative instructional design competencies for medical/legal/technical experts to solve real workplace problems

learning_goals: Through case analysis and document evaluation, they can systematically explain how to integrate creative elements into instructional design.
They can develop two or more accessible creative instructional design solutions in a mobile environment.
They can design open-ended problem-solving strategies tailored to expert domains (medical/legal/technical) and improve them through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
